data.Name: Sustain VC
data.Tagline: Early-Stage Impact Investing Venture Capital Funds
data.About:
The SustainVC series of impact investment funds back innovative entrepreneurs that share a vision of a sustainable, more equitable, and healthier world.  

Since 2007, the SustainVC series of impact funds have provided capital to early-stage and growth-stage companies with the goal of returning measurable social and environmental impact as well as market rate financial returns.  Companies are typically seeking $500,000 to $5 million. Areas of interest include: Climate & Sustainability, Equality & Empowerment, and Health & Education.

The SustainVC portfolio includes 32 high-impact companies across a broad range of sectors and geographies. 

SustainVC has offices in Boston, Durham, and Philadelphia.
